member.name: T:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient
member.summary: A client for Discord's API. Used to perform calls to their RESTful API.

member.name: M:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient.#ctor(Miki.Discord.Common.DiscordToken,Miki.Cache.ICacheClient)
member.summary: Creates a new Discord API instance.

member.name: M:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient.AddGuildBanAsync(System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a user to a guild's ban list.
member.param: Id of the guild you want to ban a user from
Id of the user you want to ban
Amount of days you want to prune messages from the user

member.name: M:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient.AddGuildMemberRoleAsync(System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Adds a role to a guild member.

member.name: M:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient.CreateDMChannelAsync(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Creates a Direct channel to a user.

member.name: M:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient.CreateEmojiAsync(System.UInt64,Miki.Discord.Common.EmojiCreationArgs)
member.summary: Creates and uploads a new emoji for a guild.

member.name: M:Miki.Discord.Rest.DiscordApiClient.CreateGuildRoleAsync(System.UInt64,Miki.Discord.Common.CreateRoleArgs)
member.summary: Creates a new role in the guild specified.
member.param: The guild in which you want to create a role.
member.returns: The role you've created, if successful
